short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome-Extension that automatically displays a nutrition chart next to nutrition tables.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates a nutrition chart (similar to various fitness tracking apps) on the product pages of German retailer REWE
